Trump administration officials have voiced concerns over India's alignment with Western efforts to isolate Russia, citing significant oil purchases and trade imbalances.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/will-be-substantially-raising-tariff-trump-targets-india-over-purchase-of-russian-oil/articleshow/123098646.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/will-be-substantially-raising-tariff-trump-targets-india-over-purchase-of-russian-oil/articleshow/123098646.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 20:37:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50572" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123099153,imgsize-50572.cms"/></item><item><title>'Not one ...': India's big message to US amid tensions over tariff, penalty threat</title><description><![CDATA[External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar advocated for a fair and multipolar global order, emphasizing that it should not be dominated by a select few nations. Speaking at the BIMSTEC Traditional Music Festival, he highlighted the role of cultural traditions in strengthening national identity and guiding national direction. Jaishankar's remarks come amid global trade tensions and diplomatic challenges for India.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/not-one-dominated-by-a-few-eam-jaishankar-on-new-world-order-big-message-amid-us-tariff-concerns-russia-oil-pressure/articleshow/123098712.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/not-one-dominated-by-a-few-eam-jaishankar-on-new-world-order-big-message-amid-us-tariff-concerns-russia-oil-pressure/articleshow/123098712.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 20:20:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="46098" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123098761,imgsize-46098.cms"/></item><item><title>Mohammed Siraj gets emotional responding to Virat Kohli's message</title><description><![CDATA[India clinched a thrilling victory against England in the fifth Test, drawing the series 2-2. Mohammed Siraj's exceptional bowling, claiming 5/104, was pivotal. Virat Kohli lauded the team's resilience, especially Siraj's dedication. Shubman Gill, named 'Player of the Series,' praised Siraj as a captain's dream, acknowledging his relentless effort.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-mohammed-siraj-gets-emotional-responding-to-virat-kohlis-message/articleshow/123099167.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-mohammed-siraj-gets-emotional-responding-to-virat-kohlis-message/articleshow/123099167.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 20:53:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="37690" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123099166,imgsize-37690.cms"/></item><item><title>Elon Musk just got $29 billion from Tesla, the company he founded himself; here’s why</title><description><![CDATA[Tesla's board has approved a $29 billion stock award for CEO Elon Musk, aiming to secure his commitment amidst challenges like declining EV sales and rising competition. This move follows a court invalidating his previous pay deal. The board believes Musk's leadership is crucial for Tesla's shift towards AI, robotaxis, and robotics.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/elon-musk-just-got-29-billion-from-tesla-the-company-he-founded-himself-heres-why/articleshow/123097733.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/elon-musk-just-got-29-billion-from-tesla-the-company-he-founded-himself-heres-why/articleshow/123097733.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 19:12:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23894" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123097736,imgsize-23894.cms"/></item><item><title>'Why is Modi afraid': Cong takes shot at PM over Trump's latest threat</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/why-is-modi-afraid-congress-takes-shot-at-pm-over-donald-trumps-latest-threat-pans-centres-foreign-policy/articleshow/123100386.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/why-is-modi-afraid-congress-takes-shot-at-pm-over-donald-trumps-latest-threat-pans-centres-foreign-policy/articleshow/123100386.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 22:21:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="41426" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123100511,imgsize-41426.cms"/></item><item><title>How India, China may not come to Trump’s rescue to get Putin to stop Russia-Ukraine war</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump's efforts to pressure Russia through China and India regarding the Russia-Ukraine war are faltering, as both nations resist halting Russian oil imports despite threats of tariffs. Rani Kapur, his mother, alleges foul play and seeks a UK probe. US authorities are monitoring the case. A family feud with Sona Comstar intensifies. Rani Kapur claims coercion and mismanagement. Sona Comstar denies the allegations. Legal battles are ongoing. The dispute involves family legacy and corporate control.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/foul-play-sunjay-kapurs-mother-rani-asks-uk-police-to-probe-mysterious-death-family-feud-escalates/articleshow/123097486.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/foul-play-sunjay-kapurs-mother-rani-asks-uk-police-to-probe-mysterious-death-family-feud-escalates/articleshow/123097486.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 19:09:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="51038" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123097737,imgsize-51038.cms"/></item><item><title>Amazon shuts Wondery podcast studio, lays off staff, CEO exits – read VP’s memo</title><description><![CDATA[Amazon is restructuring its audio division, closing the Wondery podcast studio and eliminating around 110 positions. This strategic shift reflects the evolving podcast landscape, particularly the rise of video content. Wondery's content will be redistributed to Audible and a new creator services team, focusing on personality-driven shows, while CEO Jen Sargent departs.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/amazon-shuts-down-wondery-podcast-studio-cuts-110-jobs-including-ceo/articleshow/123098424.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/amazon-shuts-down-wondery-podcast-studio-cuts-110-jobs-including-ceo/articleshow/123098424.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 20:11:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="24980" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123098083,imgsize-24980.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Nothing will happen tomorrow': Omar Abdullah plays down J&K statehood buzz</title><description><![CDATA[Amidst swirling rumors of Jammu and Kashmir's statehood restoration, Omar Abdullah tempered expectations, stating he foresees no immediate announcement. He acknowledges Google's AI changes things. But he believes people will still end up on Reddit. Reddit aims to be a search engine itself.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-tips/reddit-ceo-steven-human-sends-search-engine-warning-to-google-just-about-anybody-using-google-at-this-point-will-end-up/articleshow/123098489.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-tips/reddit-ceo-steven-human-sends-search-engine-warning-to-google-just-about-anybody-using-google-at-this-point-will-end-up/articleshow/123098489.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 20:07:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1444523" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123098447,imgsize-1444523.cms"/></item><item><title>What Harvard’s $500M rejection signals for the future of US higher education</title><description><![CDATA[Harvard University has rejected a $500 million federal settlement, sparking a major conflict over academic freedom. Sunil Gavaskar's enthusiastic applause in the commentary box highlighted the significance of the win. India's bowlers, spearheaded by Siraj, orchestrated a remarkable comeback, denying England a series victory and igniting pride among fans and legends alike.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-sunil-gavaskar-celebrates-mohammed-sirajs-winning-moment-in-oval-commentary-box-watch/articleshow/123096941.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-sunil-gavaskar-celebrates-mohammed-sirajs-winning-moment-in-oval-commentary-box-watch/articleshow/123096941.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 18:29:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="117826" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123096972,imgsize-117826.cms"/></item><item><title>‘What was the tearing hurry?’: SC questions UP govt on Banke Bihari ordinance</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court has questioned the Uttar Pradesh government's decision to take over the Shri Banke Bihari temple management in Vrindavan, citing a lack of consultation with key stakeholders before the corridor project order on May 15. The court expressed concern over the state's urgency in enacting the ordinance and its approach to the court without informing involved parties.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/what-was-the-tearing-hurry-sc-questions-up-govt-on-banke-bihari-ordinance-may-put-corridor-nod-on-hold/articleshow/123095831.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/what-was-the-tearing-hurry-sc-questions-up-govt-on-banke-bihari-ordinance-may-put-corridor-nod-on-hold/articleshow/123095831.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 17:40:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="117162" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123095853,imgsize-117162.cms"/></item><item><title>'I will change the game': Siraj's promise to himself before Day 5 heroics</title><description><![CDATA[Mohammed Siraj's stellar bowling helped India defeat England in a thrilling Test match at The Oval. India leveled the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy series 2-2 with a narrow six-run victory. Siraj took five wickets, including a crucial three-wicket haul on the final day. His efforts secured India's narrowest Test win. Siraj finished as the series' highest wicket-taker with 23 wickets. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-i-will-change-the-game-mohammed-sirajs-promise-to-himself-before-day-5-heroics/articleshow/123096099.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-i-will-change-the-game-mohammed-sirajs-promise-to-himself-before-day-5-heroics/articleshow/123096099.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 17:49:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="42068" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123096100,imgsize-42068.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>
      <guid><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></guid>
      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2021/03/IndiaUS_flag.jpg"/>
    </item>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/auto/india-ev-growth-strategy-startups-tech-innovation-product-proportion-pricing-rajeev-chaba-19643801.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India’s electric vehicle (EV) growth story depends on getting the “three Ps” right—product, proportion, and pricing—says Rajeev Chaba, CEO Emeritus of JSW MG Motor India. Experts at a CNBC-TV18 panel discussion also highlighted the need for affordable compact EVs, indigenous motor technologies, and stronger support for startups to accelerate adoption and meet the country’s 2030 EV targets.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Fri, 25 Jul 2025 21:04:37 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>
      <guid><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/auto/india-ev-growth-strategy-startups-tech-innovation-product-proportion-pricing-rajeev-chaba-19643801.htm]]></guid>
      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2023/09/electric-vehicles.jpg"/>
    </item>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[India-UK FTA and Tesla launch could boost EV awareness in the country: Pawan Goenka]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/auto/ev-penetration-india-uk-fta-tesla-entry-pawan-goenka-19643777.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India’s electric vehicle (EV) revolution is accelerating, fueled by the recent India–UK free trade agreement (FTA) and Tesla’s entry into the market, says industry veteran Pawan Goenka. He highlights that these developments will boost EV awareness and encourage consumers to explore homegrown brands like Tata and Mahindra. With passenger EV penetration now over 4% and rapid growth in three-wheelers and two-wheelers, Goenka believes India’s EV journey has finally picked up pace.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Fri, 25 Jul 2025 20:33:54 +0530]]></pubDate>
